document_data.mainbody: '''"King's Tear"''' is a short story by [[Mark Anthony]] included in the 1993 anthology ''[[Realms of Valor]]''.
document_data.Summary: The [[necromancer]] [[Kelshara]] steals the [[Tear of Everard]] from [[Everard Abbey]], and it is up to would-be-loremaster [[Tyveris]] to retrieve it, but first he must reaffirm his faith in [[Oghma]].
